channel.title: Why tom banned banned me?
channel.description: i was told that tom banned me for breaking a mob spawner inside a dungeon, is that allowed??, didn't grifed or anything, just broke a mob spawner, maybe i'm wrong and this isn't allowed, but he could have warned me before banning perm... maybe is because we killed him while pvp was on and he was angry or something, i really don't undesrstand his attitude towards me...

item.title: Why tom banned banned me?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Gravel_Boy, post:9, topic:436132”]nice then all of you are cheater because i suck at minecraft¿? come on dude, just trying to be on tom’s side, perhaps?
And i don’t have a history of problematic behaviour, i missbehaved only once and i tryed to rebuild what i broke, so i would be pleased if you point your finger somewhere else
Also i would like to know which of my friends are cheating, as you say tom…
reyx7: about that it was once, then i cleaned up the chicken mess, the second time it wasn’t me ,i was just watching,[/quote]

You always just walked around, just stood in places, had horrible grammar/spelling, and was just a sketch in general. You never seemed like someone that was trusty and that you did a lot of griefing but one block at a time.

Read full topic

item.title: Why tom banned banned me?
item.dc:creator: @Gravel_Boy Gravel_Boy
item.description:
@Gravel_Boy wrote:

I repeat, we killed tom and sppt before they reached the spawner i broke,i also didn’t know until now that the spanwer couldn’t be rolled back, i’m not a really good minecraft player, i only wanted to kill tom while pvp was on like he did with me in W2, about your house, i know it was offensive what i did, i tryed to rebuild it, but if it’s so important why tom didn’t modified it after i rebuild it??, as he was always complaining that it wasn’t the same??
it wasn’t my intention to be a d**k, i didn’t know about the spawner thing, sorry

Read full topic

item.title: Why tom banned banned me?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Gravel_Boy:

just trying to be on tom’s side, perhaps?

I personally don’t care for Tom that much, but on any given day I would side with him rather than you, based on the way you’re going about your argument.

Read full topic

item.title: Why tom banned banned me?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

All 3 spawners were found by members of our team fairly, and certainly not within 5 minutes. It sure as hell was luck that we picked the right location, however.

Also, breaking a spawner should be counted as a serious offence in my opinion, as once broken they do not spawn mobs anymore, even if rolled back by Hawk. You’ve caused permanent damage to what would of been a massive area of potential for us, and worst of all, you were seemingly unprovoked.

edit: It’s also very convenient that you happened to be building in the same area as us, and exploring in it. We picked that location at random as it best suited our needs and desires. There was no previous buildings anywhere near that area, so by right and by the fact that we were there first and found the spawners first, they are ours.

May I ask, why the hell did you break the spawner(s)(?) after just coming off a ban? And more importantly, why did you happen to break our specific spawner(s)? You had just been banned for griefing our old house completely, so was it because you were angry? Just food for thought.

Read full topic

item.title: Why tom banned banned me?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Yes, because anyone who is better than you at Minecraft is automatically a cheater. Also, it’s your word, someone who has a history of problematic behavior, and a respected member of the forums, being a moderator and server admin.

And I would love to see a list of ALL these people claiming he xrays.

Read full topic

item.title: Why tom banned banned me?
item.dc:creator: @Gravel_Boy Gravel_Boy
item.description:
@Gravel_Boy wrote:

well, when i visited the mob spawner there weren’t any torches or even a path to get there, sure your friends maybe found one but how can i be so sure that it’s the same i found??, and about the xray , a lot of people ssy that you xray so it’s not only me, and sure you are SO LUCKY that you find 3 dungeons within 5 minutes,
about the FAG letters on your roof, they where just joking, and i removed them AND TOLD YOU THAT I REMOVED THEM AS YOU ORDERED ME AND YOU STILL BANNED ME AFTER SAYING THAT IF I REMOVED THE SING I WOULDN’T BE BANNED, so hypocrit, you sure are a hell of an admin

Read full topic

item.title: Why tom banned banned me?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

For future defense anyhow, the last time I gave the OP a warning he responded by putting FAG on my roof in huge letters and leaving offensive signs on my property.

The spawner was clearly lit up around the cave system and had holes in we were using to hit them when they came to us. Hell, 3 members even announced we found it on public chat while some of you were online.

Shortly put I’m done giving you warnings after the show you gave me last time. You’re also a fool to play the “because you xrayed it” card considering I have multiple people who have all your friends pinned on cheating. You’ll find all the mob spawners I own are attached to cave systems which are all lit up.

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:2, topic:436132”]you killed Sppt while he was mining so if anyone would be angry it would be him.

The only thing I’m angry about is the fact you break everything I own in every world.[/quote]

I also don’t know if you’ve realized this yet, but my name isn’t sppt.

Read full topic

item.title: Why tom banned banned me?
item.dc:creator: @Gravel_Boy Gravel_Boy
item.description:
@Gravel_Boy wrote:

well, i believe that we killed you and them found the spawner, whatsmore, how can you say it is your spawner??? have proof?? or you say it’s yours just because you xrayed it with your friends??,

Read full topic

item.title: Why tom banned banned me?
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

If someone had already found it and claimed it/was making use of it then I believe it is the same thing as griefing which is not aloud

item.title: Why tom banned banned me?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

You sort of missed the part where you just got back from a 2 week ban for griefing and being a dick, you hadn’t been unbanned anymore than a day and you’ve griefed my mob spawners and theres some hole in my mine that I’ve not hawked yet.

But I know one of you did it because I was speaking to Nokturth about it. I don’t care about the state you’ve left my mine in as long as you clean it up, you’ve put tunnels digging down everywhere and holes of lava (your group)

It’s the principle of the situation - Punishments are supposed to teach the person a lesson, you logon 5 minutes after your unban and started breaking stuff that isn’t yours to break.

Your ban probably won’t be perm, but it’ll be until you learn to control your mouse clicking habits. You also didn’t kill me, you killed Sppt while he was mining so if anyone would be angry it would be him.

The only thing I’m angry about is the fact you break everything I own in every world.

Read full topic
